section.name: Solr server for Lutece
section.p: This plugin embeds solR server in Lutece portal. The goal is to expose solR read only for everyone and read/write for lutece portal administrators.

subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: Solr will be accessible at http://lutece-portal-uri/solr/

Post content in solR on this URI http://lutece-portal-uri/solr/update/...
You need to be authentify as a Lutece admin to be able to access /solr/update

subsection.name: Index CSV files
subsection.p: One can index CSV files in solR embeded in Lutece portal

The CSV file must be format like :
id,field1_t,field2_i,field3_t,... dataset_1,toto,521,tutu,... dataset_2,tata,521,titi,... ...
The column names are important.
You need to have a "id" column to identify a document in solR.
Column suffix can be "_t" for text content and "_i" for integer content.

One can submit a CSV file using a form like (you will need to be a connected Lutece administrator to do that):
<form action="http://lutece-portal-uri/solr/update/csv" enctype="multipart/form-data" method="post"> <input name="datafile" type="file" /> <input name="commit" type="hidden" value="true" /> <input type="submit" /> </form>
